data.actual_result: You get put back into the dm you just closed - This will not happen if you switch to another dm and back
data.expected_result: You stay on the friend list
data.short_description: When closing a dm, the client puts you back into the same dm if they send you another message
data.steps_to_repro: - decide you want to finally clean your dm list and close a dm you are currently focused on - don't touch anything OR open the dm list drawer - let the other user dm you - observe
